pr_title: Fixing the deserializing issue with ServiceStatus and its url.

timeline.message:
Fixing the deserializing issue with ServiceStatus and its url. The auto-generated version of the model class makes the field a URL instance, whereas Knative 0.12 returns a plain String.

Corresponding GH issue: https://github.com/fabric8io/kubernetes-client/issues/1727

Signed-off-by: Florian Wiesner <florian.wiesner@oracle.com>

Fixing the deserializing issue with ServiceStatus and its url. The auto-generated version of the model class makes the field a URL instance, whereas Knative 0.12 returns a plain String.

Corresponding GH issue: https://github.com/fabric8io/kubernetes-client/issues/1727

Signed-off-by: Florian Wiesner <florian.wiesner@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: nit, Could you please avoid wildcard imports? They become problematic whenever we are upgrading models and some apiVersion changes.
timeline.author: rohanKanojia
